column1: I’ve tried to contact Travel2be through their webpage ‘contact service’ to get refund for my family flights due to Corona Virus. It’s been 2 weeks but there is no answer at all. How can I contact them? Is there anybody who got refund from them?

Sorry to hear of your plight.Most people on these forums book directly with the airline - save avoiding situation that you are faced with.Di you check reviews/repution on Travel2b before booking or just take a plunge ?https://www.tripadvisor.com.au/ShowTopic-g1-…Edited: 1:18 am, March 24, 2020
Travel2Be gives appalling service in normal times. Right now, its office will be in meltdown, and I would not expect a fast response.

Hello Joomi. Thank you for your comment. You will receive a response to your mailbox in the next few days. Thank you for your cooperation.INFORMATION REGARDING COVID-19 (CORONAVIRUS): …travel2be.com/pages-information-regarding-c…Edited: 12:41 pm, March 24, 2020
